name: Submission of Resignation Email & Acceptance Letter
response:
Dear {{doc.applicant_name}},


Hope you are doing well.


As part of the joining formalities at {{doc.custom_hiring_company}}, we request you to share the following documents within the specified timeline:


Resignation Email – Kindly share a copy of your resignation email sent to your current employer within 3 days of accepting our offer.

Resignation Acceptance Letter – Please provide the resignation acceptance from your employer within 10 days of submitting your resignation.

These documents are required to ensure a smooth onboarding process. Please Share them at the earliest. Let us know if you need any assistance.


Looking forward to your confirmation.
subject: Submission of Resignation Email & Acceptance Letter
